title: kOrum varam ellAm
sahitya:
kOrum varam ellAm koDuttiDa vallavan kAruNya vaLLalAm Arumukham uLLavan


anupallavi

  sIrum sirappum nirai sendUril iruppavan cArum tannaDiyArin tAraka dayAparan


caraNam    pAril piravi eDutta pErukkavadi koDuttu sOravaikku mUzhvinai tIravaikkum upakAran
vAri mOdu malai kaDal vOram kATSi aLippavan Erumayil mIdiliru mAdarODu kaLippavan
